SEARCH
Package FOH

Class ViewReservation

java.lang.Object
FOH.ViewReservation
public class ViewReservation extends Object
The ViewReservation class manages the user interface for viewing reservations within the FOH Service Software. This class provides GUI components for displaying reservation details, filtering reservations, and performing actions such as editing, deleting, and checking out reservations.

    Constructs a new ViewReservation instance.

    • ViewReservation

      public ViewReservation()
      Constructs a new ViewReservation instance. Initializes all UI components used in the reservation viewing interface.

  • Method Details

    • start

      public void start() throws IOException
      Initializes and displays the reservation viewing interface. Configures the main frame, adds components to the panel, and makes the frame visible.
      Throws:
      IOException - if an I/O error occurs during the setup.

    • setTitle

      public void setTitle()
      Configures the title properties and adds it to the north region of the main panel.

    • setPage

      public void setPage()
      Sets up the filtering options and the reservation table.

    • setActionButtons

      public void setActionButtons(JPanel p)
      Adds action buttons for editing, deleting, and checking out reservations.
      Parameters:
      p - The panel to which the action buttons are added.

    • setBookingTable

      public void setBookingTable(JPanel p)
      Configures the reservation table and adds it to the panel.
      Parameters:
      p - The panel to which the reservation table is added.

    • getBookings

      public void getBookings()
      Retrieves reservation data from the database and populates the reservation table.
